name: Bomb n grouping
description:
A puzzlescript game about grouping colours together and using bombs. This is a game which mixes together 2 other previous games I made.

_______________________________________________________

Bomb n ice - https://rosden.itch.io/bomb-n-ice

Grouping - https://rosden.itch.io/grouping

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
